alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 8:10PM CDT until June 11 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rhea County in east Tennessee... Northern Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... West central Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 1015 PM EDT/915 PM CDT/. * At 910 PM EDT/810 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Pikeville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockwood, Dunlap, Pikeville, Spring City, Midtown, Harriman, Stinging Fork Falls State Park, Eagle Furnace, Piney Falls State Park and Mount Crest. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 348. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
